Service Details: - Provides assisted death services to individuals who wish to end their life with dignity in the manner and at the time of their choosing- For the requirements set down in Bill C-14, please visit the website and click on "For Physicians and Nurse Practitioners"
Eligibility: Ages: 18 year(s) and upFor full eligibility requirements, visit http://hemlockaid.ca/?page_id=11
Cost: If you have BC Medical Insurance (a BC CareCard) and a referral from a family doctor, the consultation with the doctor will be free. If you do not have a referral, we will still see you, but there may be an extra cost for the service. The medications will cost about $200, but should be covered by any extended medical insurance or Pharmacare.
